titleStmt.title: Panegyricon inaugurale honoratissimi & amplissimi Domini prætoris regii, sive majoris nobilissimæ & florentissimæ urbis Londinensis, a forma reipublicæ breviter conscriptum.
titleStmt.author: Sictor, Jan, 1593-1652.
Benlowes, Edward, 1603?-1676.

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed "Joh. Sictor, Bohemus" and dated: Calendis Ianuarii, anno Dom. 1638.
Contains "De celeberrima Trinobantiados Augustæ ciuitate" signed: E. Benlowes.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
